verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they put out <WH7971> of the camp <WH4264> every leper <WH6879>, and every one that has an issue <WH2100>, and whoever is defiled <WH2931> by the dead <WH5315>:

Both male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> shall you put out <WH7971>, outside <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> shall you put <WH7971> them <WH2930>; that they defile not their camps <WH4264>, in the middle <WH8432> whereof <WH834> I live <WH7931>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did so <WH6213>, and put them out <WH7971> outside <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>: as the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, so did <WH6213> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, When a man <WH376> or woman <WH802> shall commit <WH6213> any sin <WH2403> that men <WH120> commit <WH4603>, to do a trespass <WH4604> against the Lord <WH3068>, and that person <WH5315> be guilty <WH816>;

Then they shall confess <WH3034> their sin <WH2403> which they have done <WH6213>: and he shall recompense <WH7725> his trespass <WH817> with the principal <WH7218> there <WH3254>, and add unto it the fifth <WH2549> part there <WH5414>, and give it unto him against whom he has trespassed <WH816>.

But if the man <WH376> have no kinsman <WH1350> to recompense <WH7725> the trespass <WH817> unto <WH817>, let the trespass be recompensed <WH7725> unto the Lord <WH3068>, even to the priest <WH3548>; beside the ram <WH352> of the atonement <WH3725>, by which an atonement shall be made for him <WH3722>.
And every offering <WH8641> of all the holy things <WH6944> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they bring <WH7126> unto the priest <WH3548>, shall be his.
And every man <WH376>'s hallowed things <WH6944> shall be his <WH376>: whatever any man gives <WH5414> the priest <WH3548>, it shall be his.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH376>, If any man <WH376>'s wife <WH802> go aside <WH7847>, and commit <WH4603> a trespass against him <WH4604>,

And a man <WH376> lie <WH7901> with her carnally <WH7902>, and it be hid <WH5956> from the eyes <WH5869> of her husband <WH376>, and be kept close <WH5641>, and she be defiled <WH2930>, and there be no witness <WH5707> against her <WH8610>, neither she be taken with the manner;

And the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon him <WH7065>, and he be jealous of his wife <WH802>, and she be defiled <WH2930>: or if the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> come <WH5674> upon him <WH7065>, and he be jealous of his wife <WH802>, and she be not defiled <WH2930>:

Then shall the man <WH376> bring <WH935> his wife <WH802> unto the priest <WH3548>, and he shall bring <WH935> her offering <WH7133> for her <WH6224>, the tenth part of an ephah <WH374> of barley <WH8184> meal <WH7058>; he shall pour <WH3332> no oil <WH8081> upon it <WH5414>, nor put frankincense <WH3828> on it <WH4503>; for it is an offering of jealousy <WH7068>, an offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146>, bringing <WH2142> iniquity <WH5771> to memory <WH2142>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall bring her near <WH7126>, and set <WH5975> her before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> holy <WH6918> water <WH4325> in an earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627>; and of the dust <WH6083> that is in the floor <WH7172> of the tabernacle <WH4908> the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947>, and put <WH5414> it into the water <WH4325>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, and uncover <WH6544> the woman <WH802>'s head <WH7218>, and put <WH5414> the offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146> in her hands <WH3709>, which is the jealousy <WH7068> offering <WH4503>: and the priest <WH3548> shall have in his hand <WH3027> the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall charge her by an oath <WH7650>, and say <WH559> unto the woman <WH802>, If no man <WH376> have lain <WH7901> with you <WH7847>, and if you have not gone aside to uncleanness <WH2932> with another instead of your husband <WH376>, be you free <WH5352> from this bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779>:

But if you have gone aside <WH7847> to another instead of your husband <WH376>, and if you be defiled <WH2930>, and some man <WH376> have <WH5414> lain <WH7903> with you beside <WH1107> your husband <WH376>:

Then the priest <WH3548> shall charge <WH7650> the woman <WH802> with an oath <WH7621> of cursing <WH423>, and the priest <WH3548> shall say <WH559> unto the woman <WH802>, The Lord <WH3068> make <WH5414> you a curse <WH423> and an oath <WH7621> among <WH8432> your people <WH5971>, when the Lord <WH3068> does make <WH5414> your thigh <WH3409> to rot <WH5307>, and your belly <WH990> to swell <WH6639>;

And this water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779> shall go <WH935> into your bowels <WH4578>, to make your belly <WH990> to swell <WH6638>, and your thigh <WH3409> to rot <WH5307>: And the woman <WH802> shall say <WH559>, Amen <WH543>, amen <WH543>.
And the priest <WH3548> shall write <WH3789> these curses <WH423> in a book <WH5612>, and he shall blot <WH4229> them out with the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325>:

And he shall cause the woman <WH802> to drink <WH8248> the bitter <WH4751> water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779>: and the water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her <WH4751>, and become bitter.

Then the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the jealousy <WH7068> offering <WH4503> out of the woman <WH802>'s hand <WH3027>, and shall wave <WH5130> the offering <WH4503> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, and offer <WH7126> it upon the altar <WH4196>:

And the priest <WH3548> shall take an handful <WH7061> of the offering <WH4503>, even the memorial <WH234> there <WH6999>, and burn it upon the altar <WH4196>, and afterward <WH310> shall cause the woman <WH802> to drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325>.

And when he has made her to drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325>, then it shall come to pass <WH2930>, that, if she be defiled, and have done <WH4603> trespass <WH4604> against her husband <WH376>, that the water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her <WH4751>, and become bitter, and her belly <WH990> shall swell <WH6638>, and her thigh <WH3409> shall rot <WH5307>: and the woman <WH802> shall be a curse <WH423> among <WH7130> her people <WH5971>.
And if the woman <WH802> be not defiled <WH2930>, but be clean <WH2889>; then she shall be free <WH5352>, and shall conceive <WH2232> seed <WH2233>.
This is the law <WH8451> of jealousy <WH7068>, when a wife <WH802> goes aside <WH7847> to another instead of her husband <WH376>, and is defiled <WH2930>;

Or when the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> comes <WH5674> upon him <WH376>, and he be jealous <WH7065> over his wife <WH802>, and shall set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, and the priest <WH3548> shall execute <WH6213> upon her all this law <WH8451>.
Then shall the man <WH376> be guiltless <WH5352> from iniquity <WH5771>, and this <WH1931> woman <WH802> shall carry <WH5375> her iniquity <WH5771>.
